name: Volcano Roll
description: A spicy mix of crab, avocado, and cucumber, topped with spicy baked scallops and eel sauce.

name: Sunset Roll
description: Yellowtail, jalapeño, and cilantro rolled with avocado and cucumber, finished with yuzu citrus sauce.

name: Salmon Roll
description: Shrimp tempura, spicy tuna, and avocado, topped with sliced mango and sweet chili sauce.

name: Tempura Banana
description: Sliced banana tempura served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and drizzled with honey

name: Unagi (Eel) (2 pieces)
description: Grilled eel glazed with eel sauce on seasoned rice.

name: Sashimi Sampler (6 pieces)
description: A selection of thinly sliced fresh fish (tuna, salmon, yellowtail, and snapper).

name: Salmon Nigiri (2 pieces)
description: Fresh salmon slices on top of small beds of seasoned rice, garnished with wasabi.

name: Ebi (Shrimp) Nigiri (2 pieces)
description: Cooked shrimp on top of rice with a touch of wasabi and soy sauce.

name: Edamame
description: Steamed young soybeans sprinkled with sea salt.

name: Mixed Sashimi Platter
description: A larger assortment of sashimi, perfect for sharing.

name: Agedashi Tofu
description: Lightly fried tofu served in a savory dashi broth with grated daikon and ginger.

name: Miso Soup
description: Traditional Japanese miso soup with tofu, seaweed, and green onions.

name: Tuna Nigiri
description: Slices of premium tuna on rice, served with pickled ginger.

name: California Roll
description: Crab, avocado, and cucumber rolled in sushi rice and seaweed.

name: Spicy Tuna Roll
description: Fresh tuna mixed with spicy mayo, scallions, and cucumber, rolled in sushi rice and seaweed.

name: Dragon Roll
description: Eel, cucumber, and avocado topped with thinly sliced avocado, eel sauce, and tobiko.

name: Rainbow Roll
description: A variety of fresh fish (tuna, salmon, yellowtail, and more) layered on a California roll.

name: Vegetarian Roll
description: Asparagus, avocado, and cucumber rolled in sushi rice and seaweed.
